ComicInfo.Summary:
Ships: Silk's plan to blow up the Volga fails, but Savage comes to the rescue with a fiery Plan B.
Flesh Book 1 Part 9: The Dino-Express, a "time holiday" shuttle, attracts a herd of tyrannosaurs, including Old One Eye, with its Tyranno Horn.
Harlem Heroes Part 9: As the Harlem Heroes begin their game against the Montezuma Mashers, Artie Gruber aims his flamer-gun, right at Giant!
Dan Dare Part 9: Dare tricks the alien ship's mind and escapes in the Odyssey, only to land in the middle of the biggest battle man has ever fought.
Our Man in Turkostan: Probe's mission entails removing Professor Nils Nansen from Turkostan, where his nuclear prowess could start World War III.
Robots: At the 'Robot of the Year Show', Judge Dredd stops a wheelchair-bound maniac who will kill hundreds.
